course_title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers II w/Lab
course_description: Electric and magnetic fields and forces, Gauss's law, electrical properties of materials, electromagnetic induction, electromagnetic waves, and optical phenomena.
prerequisites: (PHYS 141 or PHYS_OX 141 or PHYS 151 or PHYS_OX 151) and (MATH 112 or MATH_OX 112 or MATH 116 or MATH 210) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
